channel.title: Worships on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in Worships on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: A Thankful Heart: Part 2
item.description: As we continue a brief series on gratitude, we consider Mary’s heart of thankfulness expressed in her response to the news of her pregnancy.

item.title: A Thankful Heart: Part 1
item.description: The psalmist in chapter 107 instructs the reader to thank God for his intense love and marvelous deeds.

item.title: Plank Eye
item.description: As Jesus instructs his followers in Kingdom living, he uses a dramatic illustration.

item.title: Worry
item.description: Jesus uses tangible, visible illustrations to remind us of God’s provision in our lives.

item.title: Treasure
item.description: Jesus instructs us to be careful where we place our stockpiles, our treasures.

item.title: Fasting 101
item.description: Jesus continues to challenge the motives of our spiritual practices.

item.title: The Lord's Prayer
item.description: In Matthew 6:5-15, Jesus teaches us how to pray.
